column1: Smoque BBQ////This is one of the best restaurants in the city
column2: and DEFINITELY the best BBQ place I've ever encountered
column3: which includes all the ones I've been to in Southern states. The food is indescribably good
column7: and of course both types of the BBQ sauce. The meat is so tender
column8: flavorful and cooked with care and ultimate quality. Â All the sides are delicious too. This place has excellent customer service
column9: a great ambiance inside and out on the patio
column10: and also great with catering! Trust me... If you choose Smoque to cater your party
column11: the only bad thing is that you'll have to do it for the rest of your life
column12: because every time family visits you
